backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profiles, admin-gated video CRUD, YouTube URL validation, and public video queries with AccessControl integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin-token and dashboard-UX features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including styles, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and component styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling view switching, admin gating, and automatic navigation after admin sign-in.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAuthCo: Admin auth UI that opens the token dialog, clears admin access, and triggers navigation after success.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTokenD: Dialog for entering and validating the admin token with error handling and success callbacks.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserAuthBut: Button for Internet Identity sign-in/out with loading state and react-query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with background imagery and an Explore button triggering a scroll action.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeView.ts: Fetches and displays grouped video content with loading, error, and empty states, including a hero section and video rows.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, view navigation, user auth controls, and optional admin tools.
frontend/src/components/manage/ManageVid: Provides an admin-only interface to view, add, edit, and delete videos with loading and access control states.
frontend/src/components/manage/VideoForm: Form for creating or editing a video, including validation, YouTube URL parsing, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/manage/VideoList: Displays a video entry with thumbnail, details, and edit/delete actions including a confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Shows an individual video thumbnail card that opens a player dialog when clicked.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoPlay: Modal dialog that plays a YouTube video with title and description.
Horizontal scrollable row of VideoCards with left/right scroll controls and a section title.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Checks whether the current actor has admin privileges using a react-query call.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Applies or clears an admin token, persists it, and invalidates related queries to refresh admin state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideos.ts: Fetches videos and original shows and provides mutations for creating, updating, and deleting videos with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH variables for light and dark themes and utility classes like scrollbar hiding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs and generates thumbnail URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, color variables, fonts, animations, and plugins.
